src:
酥脆日式餃子 有漂亮「羽毛」的餃子（視頻）

06 Nov 2019, 03:21

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月06日訊】酥脆羽根日式餃子
[20個份][水餃皮x 20張]中筋麵粉 All-purpose flour—120g鹽巴 Salt—少許熱水 Hot water—50cc
高麗菜 Cabbage—100g鹽巴 Salt－1/4小匙韭菜 Chinese chives－20g洋蔥 Onion—1/2個豬絞肉 Ground pork—180g蒜頭 Garlic—2粒薑 Ginger－5g清酒 Sake－1大匙鹽巴 Salt—1/3小匙醬油 Soy sauce－1/2大匙白味噌 White Miso—2小匙味淋 Mirin—2大匙白胡椒 White pepper—1/2小匙麻油 Sesame oil—1大匙
水餃6個分水 Water—50cc低筋麵粉 Cake flour—1小匙約
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701062.html
text:
Crispy Japanese Dumplings Dumplings with beautiful "feathers" (video)

06 Nov 2019, 03:21

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 06, 2019] Crispy Feathered Japanese Dumplings
[20 servings][Dumpling skin x 20 sheets] Medium-gluten flour All-purpose flour-120g salt bar Salt-a little hot water Hot water—50cc
Cabbage Cabbage—100g salt bar Salt-1/4 spoonful of leek Chinese chives-20g onion Onion—1/2 pig ground meat Ground pork—180g garlic Garlic—2 ginger Ginger-5g sake Sake-1 spoonful salt bar Salt- 1/3 tsp Soy sauce-1/2 Spoon White Miso White Miso—2 tsp Mirin—2 tablespoons White Pepper White Pepper—1/2 tsp Sesame oil—1 tbsp
Dumplings 6 waters Water-50cc low-gluten flour Cake flour—1 tsp approx
The following YouTube video demo:
